official_title: To extend until January 1, 1997, the existing suspension of duty on certain infant nursery intercoms and monitors.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1996, the suspension of duty on certain infant nursery intercoms and monitors.

titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1997, the existing suspension of duty on certain infant nursery intercoms and monitors.
